item.title: RRB NTPC UG Answer Key 2025 released, direct link here; submit objections by September 20
item.description: RRB NTPC UG Answer Key 2025 has been released. The direct link to check is given here. Candidates can submit objections by September 20, 2025.

item.title: RRB NTPC UG Answer Key 2025 OUT Live: Provisional key released for CBT 1, direct link here
item.description: RRB NTPC UG Answer Key 2025 News Live Updates: The RRBs have released the NTPC UG answer key 2025. Candidates can click on the direct link given below.

item.title: West Bengal teacher recruitment test for classes 11-12 draws 2.29 lakh aspirants
item.description: The School Level Selection Test (SLST), being held after nine years, was conducted across 478 centres, all located in educational institutions.
